verses.t: Beloved{G27}, believe{G4100} not{G3361} every{G3956} spirit{G4151}, but{G235} try{G1381} the spirits{G3588} whether{G1487} they are{G2076} of{G1537} God{G3588}: because{G3754} many{G4183} false prophets{G5578} are gone out{G1831} into{G1519} the world{G3588}.

Hereby{G1722} know ye{G1097} the Spirit{G3588} of God{G3588}: Every{G3956} spirit{G4151} that{G3739} confesseth that{G3670} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547} is come{G2064} in{G1722} the flesh{G4561} is{G2076} of{G1537} God{G3588}:Two Greek tags, en toutw, go with one English word, hereby.

And{G2532} every{G3956} spirit{G4151} that{G3739} confesseth{G3670} not{G3361} that Jesus{G3588} Christ{G5547} is come{G2064} in{G1722} the flesh{G4561} is{G2076} not{G3756} of{G1537} God{G3588}: and{G2532} this{G5124} is{G2076} that{G3588} spirit of antichrist{G3588}, whereof{G3739} ye have heard{G191} that{G3754} it should come{G2064}; and{G2532} even now{G3568}already{G2235} is it{G2076} in{G1722} the world{G3588}.

Ye{G5210} are{G2075} of{G1537} God{G3588}, little children{G5040}, and{G2532} have overcome{G3528} them{G846}: because{G3754} greater{G3187} is he{G2076} that{G3588} is in{G1722} you{G5213}, than{G2228} he that{G3588} is in{G1722} the world{G3588}.

They{G846} are{G1526} of{G1537} the world{G3588}: therefore{G1223} speak they{G2980} of{G1537} the world{G3588}, and{G2532} the world{G3588} heareth{G191} them{G846}.Two Greek words - dia touto form one English word - therefore.

We{G2249} are{G2070} of{G1537} God{G3588}: he that knoweth{G1097} God{G3588} heareth{G191} us{G2257}; he that{G3739} is{G2076} not{G3756} of{G1537} God{G3588} heareth{G191} not{G3756} us{G2257}. Hereby{G1537} know we{G1097} the spirit{G3588} of truth{G3588}, and{G2532} the spirit{G3588} of error{G3588}.

Beloved{G27}, let us love{G25} one another{G240}: for{G3754} love{G3588} is{G2076} of{G1537} God{G3588}; and{G2532} every one{G3956} that{G3588} loveth{G25} is born{G1080} of{G1537} God{G3588}, and{G2532} knoweth{G1097} God{G3588}.
He that loveth{G25} not{G3361} knoweth{G1097} not{G3756} God{G3588}; for{G3754} God{G3588} is{G2076} love{G26}.

In{G1722} this{G5129} was manifested{G5319} the love{G3588} of God{G3588} toward{G1722} us{G2254}, because that{G3754} God{G3588} sent{G649} his{G846} only begotten{G3439} Son{G3588} into{G1519} the world{G3588}, that{G2443} we might live{G2198} through{G1223} him{G846}.

Herein{G1722} is{G2076} love{G3588}, not{G3756} that{G3754} we{G2249} loved{G25} God{G3588}, but{G235} that{G3754} he{G846} loved{G25} us{G2248}, and{G2532} sent{G649} his{G846} Son{G3588} to be the propitiation{G2434} for{G4012} our{G2257} sins{G3588}."Herein" translates two Greek words (en toutw).
Beloved{G27}, if{G1487} God{G3588} so{G3779} loved{G25} us{G2248}, we{G2249} ought{G3784} also{G2532} to love{G25} one another{G240}.

No man{G3762} hath seen{G2300} God{G2316} at any time{G4455}. If{G1437} we love{G25} one another{G240}, God{G3588} dwelleth{G3306} in{G1722} us{G2254}, and{G2532} his{G846} love{G3588} is{G2076} perfected{G5048} in{G1722} us{G2254}.

Hereby{G1722} know we{G1097} that{G3754} we dwell{G3306} in{G1722} him{G846}, and{G2532} he{G846} in{G1722} us{G2254}, because{G3754} he hath given{G1325} us{G2254} of{G1537} his{G846} Spirit{G3588}."Hereby" translates two Greek words (en toutw).
And{G2532} we{G2249} have seen{G2300} and{G2532} do testify{G3140} that{G3754} the Father{G3588} sent{G649} the Son{G3588} to be the Saviour{G4990} of the world{G3588}.
Whosoever{G3739} shall confess{G3670} that{G3754} Jesus{G2424} is{G2076} the Son{G3588} of God{G3588}, God{G3588} dwelleth{G3306} in{G1722} him{G846}, and{G2532} he{G846}in{G1722} God{G3588}.

And{G2532} we{G2249} have known{G1097} and{G2532} believed{G4100} the love{G3588} that{G3739} God{G3588} hath{G2192} to{G1722} us{G2254}. God{G3588} is{G2076} love{G26}; and{G2532} he that dwelleth{G3306} in{G1722} love{G3588} dwelleth{G3306} in{G1722} God{G3588}, and{G2532} God{G3588} in{G1722} him{G846}.

Herein{G1722} is{G5048} our{G3326} love{G3588} made perfect{G5048}, that{G2443} we may have{G2192} boldness{G3954} in{G1722} the day{G3588} of judgment{G3588}: because{G3754} as{G2531} he{G1565} is{G2076}, so{G2532} are{G2070} we{G2249} in{G1722} this{G5129} world{G3588}."Herein" translates two Greek words (en toutw). "Our" translates two Greek words (met hmwn).

There is{G2076} no{G3756} fear{G5401} in{G1722} love{G3588}; but{G235} perfect{G5046} love{G26} casteth{G906} out{G1854} fear{G3588}: because{G3754} fear{G3588} hath{G2192} torment{G2851}. He that feareth{G5399} is{G5048} not{G3756} made perfect{G5048} in{G1722} love{G3588}.I did not place the tag for "de." There is no corresponding English word.

We{G2249} love{G25} him{G846}, because{G3754} he{G846} first{G4413} loved{G25} us{G2248}."Agapwmen" can be either indicative or subjunctive. I placed the indicative tag around "love" and the subjunctive tag after "love."

If{G1437} a man{G5100} say{G2036}, I love{G25} God{G3588}, and{G2532} hateth{G3404} his{G846} brother{G3588}, he is{G2076} a liar{G5583}: for{G1063} he that loveth{G25} not{G3361} his{G846} brother{G3588} whom{G3739} he hath seen{G3708}, how{G4459} can{G1410} he love{G25} God{G3588} whom{G3739} he hath{G3708} not{G3756} seen{G3708}?"Say" translates two words (eiph oti). I placed the tag for "oti" after "say."
And{G2532} this{G3778} commandment{G3588} have we{G2192} from{G575} him{G846}, That{G2443} he who loveth{G25} God{G3588} love{G25} his{G846} brother{G3588} also{G2532}.
